Trade/Device Name(s): On Call Express Blood Glucose Monitoring System
On Call Express Blood Glucose Meter
On Call Express Blood Glucose Test Strips
On Call Express Glucose Control Solution
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): On Call Express Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for On Call Express Blood Glucose Monitoring System utilizing amperometric detection and glucose oxidase for measuring glucose in capillary whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertips, forearm, and palm by people with diabetes at home as an aid in monitoring diabetes control; not for diagnosis or neonatal use, for single-patient in vitro diagnostic use only.
